content: I'm not capable of seeing or experiencing things in the same way humans can, so i haven't seen a cumulonimbus cloud up close. however, i can tell you that cumulonimbus clouds are tall, dense clouds that form during thunderstorms and can produce lightning, hail, and heavy rain. they can be intimidating from a distance, and up close, they can be very dangerous. it's always best to observe clouds from a safe distance and take appropriate precautions during severe weather.
